name: SpaceFighter2D
description:
Kill as many enemies as you can before they kill you.

W,S - Forward and Backward

A,D - Turn

Space - Shoot

ESC - Pause

An easy mode is turned on by default in main menu settings. But, if you want to challenge yourself(or feel useless), you can turn this mode off.

Try it and you will find out what it is doing! :)

First game ever. Would appreciate any reviews.
